text:
Marko Pantelić (,; born 15 September 1978) is a retired Serbian footballer who played as a striker. He represented Serbia at the 2010 FIFA World Cup.
On 21 August 2010, Pantelić joined Olympiacos on a free transfer. He signed a two-year contract worth €1.6 million per year. He scored his first goal against Panserraikos.
On 11 December 2011, Pantelić managed to score four goals and to secure a victory against Kerkyra.
